founders.name: Harry Halpin
founders.background: PhD in Informatics and Philosophy from University of Edinburgh. Former senior research scientist at MIT where he led standardization of Web Cryptography API. Previously worked at Inria de Paris on socio-technical systems and privacy.

founders.name: Alexis Roussel
founders.background: Established Bity (Swiss crypto brokerage and financial services firm). Led the Swiss Pirate Party in support of privacy rights.

key_team_members.name: Claudia Diaz
key_team_members.background: Part-time Associate Professor at KU Leuven (COSIC), specializing in developing and analyzing online privacy protection technologies. Co-author of Nym whitepaper.

key_team_members.name: Aggelos Kiayias
key_team_members.background: Co-authored the Nym whitepaper published February 2021.
